title: IModelView.IGetStereoSeparation
description: Obsolete and not superseded. Functionality no longer implemented.
returns: Array of 2 doubles representing the stereo magnitude and stereo parallax balance settings
remarks:
This method checks the two stereoscopic display values which can be set by using
IModelView::SetStereoSeparation
or
IModelView::ISetStereoSeparation
.
